section.heading: Children and Youth Initiative established.
section.text: There is established a Children and Youth Initiative (“Initiative”) to provide out-of-school programs for District of Columbia children and youth.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 21-261: § 12 of D.C. Law 21-261 provided that the repeal of this section by § 10 of D.C. Law 21-261 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore the change made to this section by that amendment has been delayed.
